amendment.description: Amendment requires each agency's Inspector General to report annually to the House and Senate Committees on the Budget, the Judiciary, and Appropriations on any settlement agreement entered into by an during the previous year that are in violation of section 2.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 114-724 to require each agency's Inspector General to report annually to the House and Senate Committees on the Budget, the Judiciary, and Appropriations on any settlement agreement entered into by an during the previous year that are in violation of section 2.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price, Tom amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Price, Tom.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Price, Tom amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
